to_address: "Speakup is a screen review system for Linux." <speakup@braille.uwo.ca>
subject: Got it!
body:
Got the sucker.  It was in the /ect/profile.d? dir in all those 
scripts.  Commented out all the *.csh and *.sh aliases and added a 
.profile file in the home dir, and everything works.  Thank you all for 
all the help.

         Michael
